qas.question: What was the 106 mile push through enemy territory called?
Who was defeated near Seoul, Korea?

context: After the Incheon landing, the 1st Cavalry Division began its northward advance from the Pusan Perimeter. "Task Force Lynch" (after <a0_0>Lieutenant Colonel James H. Lynch<a0_0/>), 3rd Battalion, 7th Cavalry Regiment, and two 70th Tank Battalion units (Charlie Company and the Intelligence–Reconnaissance Platoon) effected <a1_0>the "Pusan Perimeter Breakout"<a1_0/> through 106.4 miles (171.2 km) of enemy territory to join the 7th Infantry Division at Osan. The X Corps rapidly defeated <a2_0>the KPA<a2_0/> defenders around Seoul, thus threatening to trap the main KPA force in Southern Korea.
